    1: <?php
    2: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Model\RcSite;
    3:
    4: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk AS Main;
    5: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env AS Env;
    6: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\File AS File;
    7: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Model AS Model;
    8:
    9: const SITE_CONFIG_FILE = '.site.php';
    10:
    11: /** Basic resource configuration site file (.site.php)
    12: * @return Object $obj [ 'SiteName', 'AdminEmail', 'DbHandler', 'Dsn', 'DataDir', 'AddonDir' ]
    13: */
    14: function Def () {
    15: $obj = new \stdClass();
    16: $obj->Root = Main\app_path();
    17: $obj->SiteName = false;
    18: $obj->AdminEmail = false;
    19: $obj->DbHandler = "sqlite";
    20: $obj->Dsn = ":memory";
    21: $obj->DataDir = false;
    22: $obj->AddonDir = false;
    23: return $obj;
    24: }
    25:
    26: /** Check if RcSite configuration file is valid, parse, and load.
    27: * @param Object $resource_paths
    28: * @param Array $related_path_info
    29: * @return Object $obj Def && Related\path_info()
    30: */
    31: function Load (Object $paths=NULL, Array $related=NULL) {
    32: $paths = ($paths)
    33: ? $paths
    34: : (object) [
    35: 'rcsite' => Path()
    36: ];
    37: $related = ($related)
    38: ? $related
    39: : [];
    40: $def = Def();
    41: $custom_obj = false;
    42: ob_start();
    43: if (is_file($paths->rcsite)) {
    44: try {
    45: $custom_obj = File\Model\YAML\decode(Model\Template\Interp(File\read($paths->rcsite), [ 'app_root' => $def->Root ] ));
    46: } catch (\Exception $e) {
    47: $def->error = $e->getMessage();
    48: }
    49: }
    50: ob_end_clean();
    51:
    52: return ($custom_obj)
    53: ? (object) array_merge(
    54: (array) $def,
    55: $related,
    56: (array) $custom_obj)
    57: : $def;
    58: }
    59:
    60: /** Resource configuration site file path
    61: * @return String $path
    62: */
    63: function Path (String $path=NULL) {
    64: $path = ($path) ? $path : SITE_CONFIG_FILE;
    65: $def = Def();
    66: $dir = (Main\rc_directory_alt())
    67: ? Main\rc_directory_alt()
    68: : $def->Root;
    69:
    70: return File\mkpath($dir, $path);
    71: }
